meanings.definition: Having a flat-topped or convex flower cluster in which the central or terminal flower opens first
meanings.sent1: The cymose flowers on the plant bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The cymose arrangement of flowers made the bouquet look elegant.
meanings.sent3: The cymose display of flowers seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a cymose manner, with each strand perfectly in place.
meanings.sent5: The cymose pattern of stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Arranged in a cyme, or having a cyme-like inflorescence
meanings.sent1: The cymose structure of the plant's flowers caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The garden featured various plants with cymose blooms.
meanings.sent3: The cymose design of the floral arrangement added a touch of sophistication.
meanings.sent4: The cymose branches intertwined elegantly in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cymose layout of the garden created a harmonious atmosphere.
